channel.title: Help, equiping items
channel.description: i need to equip the item in 3rd space... can seomoen tell me the code please? thankyou

item.description:

i think (well i know in the case of getting the numbers for casting spells) that some things dont show when right clicked…i think it applies to all things in the main menu

item.description:
@system wrote:

or you could just right click on it. If your buiding a script you should ask in the scripting help forum

item.title: Help, equiping items
item.dc:creator: @yeha_x_d yeha x d
item.description:
@yeha_x_d wrote:

if you wish to see the console code to correspond to clicking on anything in runescape then go to debugging mode (f6 i think) it does depend what client you use

then click the thing in the client…the command prompt window SHOULD show you a bunch of numbers (hopefully just one)…for example if I turn on debugging mode then click on the cast wind blast spell button in the spells section of my menu the number ‘163’ (this is not the correct number) should pop up

correct me if im wrong

Read full topic
